text: Pay for It may refer to: * "Pay for It (Jay Rock song)", 2014 * "Pay for It", a 2008 song by Mindless Self Indulgence from their album If * "Pay for It", a 2016 song by Rebecca Ferguson from her album Superwoman * "I'll Pay For It", a 2003 song by Soulja Slim from his album Years Later...A Few Months After * "Payforit", a mobile payment provider in the UK
title: Pay for It
